short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ultimate tool for annotating and capturing web pages. Easily add and save comments on any part of a web page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your web browsing experience with WebNote & Capture, the ultimate tool for annotating and capturing web pages.

Features:

Pin Comments: Easily add and save comments on any part of a web page. Your notes will be there when you return, making it perfect for research, project collaboration, and more.
Organized Annotations: Comments are saved by page URL, ensuring your notes are always relevant to the content you're viewing.
Edit & Delete: Modify or remove your comments at any time to keep your annotations up to date.
Full-Page Screenshots: Capture the entire webpage with a single click. No more scrolling and piecing together screenshots.
Export & Import: Easily export your comments and screenshots to share with others or import them to another device.
Whether you're a student, researcher, or professional, WebNote & Capture enhances your productivity by keeping your notes and web content seamlessly integrated. Try it now and take control of your web experience!
